values:
ok heres the scoop...

i cant really post anything i want to say in here, due to people who read this...

so things have been good

we havent practiced in weeks

me and zach (tits) are starting a new band, its gonna be awesome

if you want the address to my new journal IM me aim - xstrengthtorisex
and no im not doing the friends only thing



i fucking hate this having to sneak around and shit...ugh...fuck



---------------matt

AFI or Ensign?
...i guess afi...old afi

Brand New or Dashboard Confessional?
- fuck both of these bands

Circle Takes the Square or Underoath?
- underoath 

Misfits or Tiger Army?
- they wouldnt be fighting in the first place...but old misfits

The Used or The Ataris?
- it ends in a draw...they both lose

Poison the Well or Finch?
- poison the well

Thrice or Thursday?
- thrice

Taking Back Sunday or Saves the Day?
- no contest...2 deaths

Silverstein or A Static Lullaby?
- they both lose

Further Seems Forever or At The Drive-In?
- at the drive in.


Zao or As I Lay Dying?
- as i lay dying, before they got huge

Ramones or The Clash?
- The Clash.

The Agony Scene or Dead Poetic?
- agony scene i guess...i dislike both of these bands

NOFX or The Vandals?
- i could go either way

Anti-flag or Bad Religion?
- Bad Religion

Something Corporate or Yellowcard?
- how about a bullet in the brain for both

Weezer or The Strokes?
- weezer

The Vines or The Hives?
- they both suck

Early November or Matchbook Romance?
- terrible bands

Coheed & Cambria or Mae?
- Coheed and Cambria

Jack Off Jill or Otep?
- lets drop our guitars down to DROP A...fuck that

Placebo or HIM?
- placebo

A Perfect Circle or Tool?
- i was never a big fan of maynard, i dont think i will be

Marilyn Manson or Nine Inch Nails?
- neither

Deftones or Staind?
- deftones...fuck staind and that whiney bitch singer

Korn or Godsmack?
- korn 94-98

CKY or Blink 182?
- cky

Silverchair or Goldfinger?
- Goldfinger.

Avenged Sevenfold or Killswitch Engage?
- killswitch engage because avenged sevenfold blows ass

Minor Threat or Social Distortion?
- minor threat

Bleeding Through or Throwdown?
- throwdown, straight edge over makeup any day

Norma Jean or Remembering Never?
- Norma Jean.

From Autumn to Ashes or Further Seems Forever?
- from further autumn seems forever to ashes...clique

Boys Night Out or Fall Out Boy?
- ...no thanks

Between the Buried and Me or Atreyu?
- between the buried and me

Unearth or The Red Chord?
- this is actually a tough question...they wouldnt fight...

Haste The Day or The Chariot
- haste the day...the chariot needs to calm down a little bit...stage presence is cool...but these guys take it too far

Senses Fail or Hidden In Plain View
- ...

AC/DC or Led Zeppelin
- they wouldnt fight...

No Easy Answer or Aspen It Is
- who the fuck are these people

Rufio or Lagwagon
- let them both die

Metallica or Alkaline Trio
- haha what a comparison

Fear Before The March of Flames or Blood Brothers
- Fear Before the March of Flames, fuck the blood brothers and their sunglasses

From First To Last or My Chemical
neither...

Sixth Grade
What were you like: shy, quiet, stupid

What was your favorite class: band, me and scott got last chair every time

Who was your best friend: matt watson

Who did you have a crush on: noone


Seventh Grade
What were you like: still shy, still quiet, not as stupid, better skater, getting better at guitar

What was your favorite class: shop

Who was your best friend: matt watson/justin smoot

Who did you have a crush on: noone


Eighth Grade
What were you like: shy, quiet still, opened up to more music than metal, even better at guitar

What was your favorite class: shop, me and scott talked about dumb shit while putting off our projects

Who was your best friend: adam gerval, jake garcia

Who did you have a crush on: caitlin sowell


Freshman Year
What were you like: shy, quiet, slackin on the skateboarding but decent, even better guitarist

What was your favorite class: computer maintenance

Who was your best friend: adam gerval, jake garcia

Who did you have a crush on: caitlin sowell

Something random: i failed everything but my electives, went to summerschool and passed everything within days


Sophomore Year
What were you like: shy, quiet, wanting to start a new band, better at guitar

What was your favorite class: p.e....its all about me punching a volleyball into the basketball goal

Who was your best friend: adam gerval, jake garcia

Something random: my band with adam broke up


Junior Year
What were you like: shy, quiet, even better guitarist

What was your favorite class: computer applications

Who was your best friend: the guys in the band

Who did you have a crush on: i really didnt this year...or i just dont remember

Something random: my U.s. history teacher failed me by one point


Senior(current) Year
What were you like: less shy, less quiet, alot better guitarist

What was your favorite class: web mastering

Who was your best friend: the guys in the band and the scene since i actually know them now then before i wouldnt talk to anyone

Who do you have a crush on: i dont really have a crush, there is a girl in california who i met here that i really like, but there is this girl at school who is amazingly gorgeous, but ill never talk to her just cuz id rather look and not touch 

Something random: i want to be in a youth crew hardcore band, either guitar, or vocals

another random fact: i listen to new found glory

anything you want to add: yes...i was never insecure i was just really shy, ive never had an easy time going up to people and talking and starting convorsation, ive always known what i wanted, i just could never work up the courage to get it...fuck it

--------------matt

its been cold lately, ive been wearing what i usually wear, jacket, jeans, old ass pumas, shirt under jacket...i look like a cartoon character...

people who are wearing scarves are dumb...there are people who live in this weather and wear SHORTS because they think its hot...i applaud them...the people who wear shorts in this weather obviously have a cold season that is a valid temperature to wear a scarf in...but here in texas....scarves are not necessary, seriously...the 60's isnt cold, hell the only reason you should even think about wearing a scarf is A.)it is a joke, or B.)its really freezing, as in under 32 degrees...| otherwise...leave the fucking scarf at home

anyway...we're supposed to be playing twice this weekend...if i was the betting type id put money on it we dont play at all...

....get this shit...some kid a few weeks ago comes up to me commenting on my minor threat patch and huge safety pin on my backpack saying i should join his 'punk' band...first of all...i love punk...dont get me wrong...but theres no fucking way in hell ill join his lame ass band...plus im busy with other things....second of all....he wanted it to sound nothing like punk....he wanted some pussy ass good charlotte bullshit...fuck that...third...this kid knew NOTHING about music...all he knows is what hes seen on shirts in hot topic...he thinks minor threat was like the casualties...obviously this kid doesnt listen to music...or if he does its all on the radio...so i said...no thanks...because i dont like to break it down in front of everyone...publicly...

anyway....ive concluded my thesis that the lady who is a student teacher for my u.s. history (round 2...failed it by one point last year)...is a fucking moron who cant teach for shit and looks like a crack addict that has was too much free time to put loads of makeup on...although it doesnt cover up the BLACK around her eyes from not sleeping...this bitch constantly has a stick shoved up her ass...today she yelled at matt (our drummer) for saying shut up...c'mon saying shut up is about as bad as breathing...its not....i cant wait till she goes back to her school...to learn how to not teach a class successfully even better...goddamn...

so anyway...first semester is pretty much 3/4ths over...pretty sweet...

ive become addicted to Trolli Brite Octopi, if you ever get a chance...try them out...they are some good gummy snacks...

i had some lame ass whiney line written here but i decided it was really stupid of me to say

i wish it was april...dont ask me why

lets see...oh..i got it...ill end with my music equipment want list:
new guitar not sure what
new cabinet
flight case for 5150II
rack tuner
rack noise gate
rack
rackmount for my wireless
rack drawer so i can store my chords and shit in there
double bass pedal
drumsticks
drum heads
cymbals
few sets of guitar strings
aaaand thats it

-------------------------matt

ok heres the shit....

this girl penny cermak....fucking slut...so ive heard has herpes....disgusting bitch just on her own...mind you shes fucking nuts(the bad way)...ok so she tells a bunch of people that me and her had sex...we were drunk...and it was a one night stand....h'ok dont make me break this shit down for nothing

XXX:
NO drugs including cigarettes
NO alcohol
NO promiscuous sex this means no one night stands

second of all IM A VIRGIN FOR FUCKS SAKE ID KNOW IF I LOST IT

plus id never lose it to that skank...

ok yes i sound really pissed off...cuz i am...some dumb bitch is walking around saying we had sex when i fucking hate this scum of the earth whore i wouldnt touch her with a fucking universe of space...

why do people lie about shit like this to sound cool...


if murder was legal...id gut the bitch....

and if you know me at all you know i dont get pissed off easy and i rarely talk about stuff like this....so you know im pretty irate...

---------------matt

so ive come to the conclusion that im waaay out of shape...
im not fat or anything...i just get fatigued quicker than i use to...
i need to do something about it...

+future refrence: ok anyway, anyway = new subject most of the time+

so ive been doing absolutely nothing lately...shit sucks...ive come to almost hate the weekend as much as the work week...what a fucking waste of time the weekend is...the only thing i ever do any more is go to shows...i havent left my house to go somewhere that wasnt a show since...summer...when i went to go hang out with everyone at jims...or some sort of practice...anyway...fuck it...i guess i dont have to worry about anything if i stay at home doing nothing because if nothing happends and im not doing anything there are no consequences...ok anyway...yeah i doubt anyone really reads this so...this past week ive had not 1 not 2 not even 3 but 4 girls come on to me OVER THE FUCKING INTERNET...fuck the internet...its not a bad thing to meet someone over the internet...but when you go to the same school as that person and you dont even fucking look at them if they say hey to you...you are fucked up....im sorry that just bugs the fuck out of me...atleast when i meet people online and they say hey to me i atleast...atleast wave to them or say hey back...im not saying im against meeting people over the internet...but i am against meeting people that dont really want to meet me...ok anyway...so if i mentioned it before then maybe you know about this...ok so theres this girl in california i met here at our show with element eighty i believe back in april?....i think...yeah...so anyway...to make a long story short i didnt hear from her from the end of may up until about a month ago...then she wrote me a letter...i wont discuss the letter cuz that would be pointless....so yeah i wrote her back and i havent sent it to her...i got her letter on the 24th of september and i still havent sent the letter...i feel so bad...i havent really had any time though...through my doing nothing thing means i dont do anything on the weekends...im pretty busy during the week...anyway...we're playing saturday at sin13 with folly again...amazing band...we play at 9:30...its gonna be fun...i get to use my new amp live FINALLY...rad....ok anyway...anyone noticed how comedy central has started to blow ass lately...maybe its just me...but its getting fucking lame...

alright..thats it...long post...i didnt say everything i wanted to...but fuck it...im out

--------------------matt

no this is not a post about converge, however i am seeing them tomorrow

anyway...

youre killing it
dont make excuses
dont talk behind my fucking back
youre lost
why dont you wake the fuck up and get a clue
grow the fuck up
wise the fuck up
dont do whats "cool" cuz its far from cool
why dont you just fucking stand up for yourself you piece of trash
dont plan on depending on people your whole life
get out and make something of yourself
why the fuck wont you just stop and look at yourself
youre fucking pathetic
...you fail me...

------------matt

so it came it, its amazing...clean tone rules, distortion is heavy as fuck, i love this amp...plus it sounds great through my cabinet...

anyway....a ton of stuff has been going on, shows, practice, websites, school, etc...

i hate bad situations...

i think we're playing with between the buried and me and darkest hour in november, that should be kool

im hoping i get in this is the sun...that would be sweet...

im hoping that the new project without a name starts soon...itll be amazing...mmm 7 strings...

------------------matt

so...ive been busy...we have new shows...9-24 sin13...9-26 white rabbit...10-2 booming t's...mid october? alamo heights high school???....late october sin13 or white rabbit...maybe a touring show sometime....

ive been making alot of webpages lately...being busy is alright i guess

my amp isnt in yet...hopefully itll be here soon...i cant wait...

we sound really good with matt on drums now...

i have nothing important to say....

--------------------matt

headcase is no longer our name, its strength to rise, yes its 3 words...who cares, atleast we move when we play, fuck we do more than move...

most likely we'll be having a show september 26th at the white rabbit...its a sunday

so expect shows at all 3 main clubs from us, and maybe various locations around town...

the city is ours...

-peavey 5150-II
-korg rackmount tuner
-rocktron HUSH super c
-new cabinet, i might construct my own though either 4x12 or 6x12
-if i dont make the cab im either going to get a new 4x12 or a 2x12
-a sufficient spaced rackmount case so i can store the rackmount gear
-something to mount my wireless too..

thats alot of guitar items...but once i get it all i wont really need anything for a while unless i break something

first...i need some money


--------------matt

no joke....i had to get it cut....it was on the bottom of my hair...so i didnt get it all cut off.....it goes down to about my chin...i have no idea how the gum got there...i havent chewed gum in weeks...this is fucked up.....oh well...life goes on...

----------matt

yeah, i decided about 95% sure that i will get the peavey 5150-II, ive asked and listened to them and i really like how they sound...i still want to try one out for myself though....

i also decided that im ready to go back to school....im at the point where i have nothing to do but sit around and do nothing...i guess itll be alrite to be at school doing something rather than sitting at home....oh well...

yeah im bored...


-----------------matt

ok so its 2 in the am, and im bored....i downloaded super nintendo today on my computer....its fun, i went to a show tonite....it was awesome...fights, flying trashcan, bar stools being shattered, thats right...shattered....good times...too many nu kids with bad attitudes...quote griff "nu metal pants with the unearth shirt....why does it have to be like this"...oh well it was bound to happen anyway...

i like the 5150's more and more every time i see a band play with them unless the band sucks...crazy...i dont think so....

yeah...im bored....i saw someone i havent seen in a while tonite...still didnt talk though...no big deal i guess....

ok thats it...

------------------matt

i cant sleep, and it sucks...

ive been looking at a picture for a little while tonight, its the most gorgeous thing ive ever seen...i wish i could have had the privaledge to be in the same room and or take the photograph...maybe someday, ill be close to this...


i wrote a pretty good song this weekend, its kinda simple, but its put together nicely...

im tired of being at home, alone, every night, noone online worth talking to about stuff worth talking about, noone wants to hear what i have to say anyway...oh well...this is not a plea for someone to talk to, and if youre taking it that way, youve missed the point...

im starting my own design label thing, so far i have 3 clients, id like some more, im not charging yet, and ill charge who i want...if i feel they should be....im leniant...so far ive only done websites these 3 all for bands im in, currently im working on a site for a band called for those who fail, from eagle pass texas, its coming along... here are my sites that are up and running: http://www.xstrengthtorisex.tk http://www.getalifehxc.tk http://www.xheadcasex.tk
im designing the labels website as i type this, its almost done really and i like it, i will probably update it when i learn more html, so i can put more on the site...

yeah im bored...

i hate being home alone...



-----------------matt

ive been too busy to keep up with this, so heres a new post ive made a few websites, recorded with get a life, played some shows, looked in to a new amp peavey 5150II, im yet to try it out...i wrote a new song today for Strength To Rise, i like it alot, hopefully everyone else will cuz i think its really catchy...we shall see soon enough...alot of people have changed their user names and screen names and whatever lately...however i wont...eventhough my band can no longer be headcase i wont change it...just cuz...so yeah...im bored....what gives....alrite anyway...i think thats it for now......and you know im not saying everything i want to.... headcasematt ----matt

yeah i just had a freaaaaky case of deja vu for about an hour straight...shit just kept reoccurring...yeah you dont know what the hell im talking about...

i need a new amp, either a genz benz el diablo100, mesa/boogie triple rectofier, and im waiting to play through the new mesa amp the stiletto, and the new krank 100w head, all i need is a head more than likely 100 watts probably nothing more because my cab is only 140w...keep in mind the amp is mainly going to be used for heinous distortion, i might get a rack too and start making a whole rig cuz that would be fuckin badass

anyway...im tired of being bored...i need something new in my life....and no once again...its the same thing...and its not an item bought at any store...or with any money....


fuck being bored
-------------------matt

Your True Nature by llScorpiusll
Username

In a survival situation, you:Cleverly trick your attacker

In groups, you:Are the entertainment

Your weakness is:Your lack of sensitivity
Created with the ORIGINAL MemeGen!
...interesing...i dont think im very entertaining in groups though...and i dont think the weakness one is right...i think my weakness is that i think too much

5 parts mercy
5 parts silliness
3 parts empathy

Blend at a low speed for 30 seconds. Top it off with a sprinkle of caring and enjoy!

Ingredients:
3 parts pride

Method:
Stir together in a glass tumbler with a salted rim. Serve with a slice of emotion and a pinch of salt. Yum!

friday...july nineth twothousandfour
bored as fuck
i was thinking about soundproofing my room earlier...
-too much work
summerschool sucks
i want to buy too much stuff, but have no money for it...
actually its only 2 things...but its music equipment...and none of that is cheap
sonor force 3003 white sparkle drumset w/ gibraltar double pedal, ziljian a custom cymbals, genz benz el diablo 100w guitar amp with cabinet...although i could run it through my cabinet...and maybe an ibanez rg 7string guitar...
i would also like something no money can buy...but its too hard to find these days...and i have a feeling ill never find it...oh well...ill still look though...doesnt hurt to look....
i have severe writers block sorta...
drummers are hard to find...anyone know one that would want to play for us?....maybe?
august 26th, folly at sin13...we're playing this show hopefully...itll be kool...ill be there
i want too much...eventhough for some reason i think i deserve it...

fuck em...

--------------matt

i cant believe how lame and trendy people are, "yeah i agree with you(only for a limited time while everyone else is doing it but im doing it in a "same but different way") everything is kool

im tired of people just saying shit because it will make others happy, you know what, its your fucking opinion, voice it, who gives a shit if other people like it, its a FUCKING OPINION

im sick of music trends, i like what i like, you like what you like, ill play what i want to play, not what everyone else plays, dont fucking copy me

ill admit...the headcase website looked like the eroica website...big fucking deal...i liked the design, but i tried pop-up windows and it didnt work...i shouldnt have made the background grey....

im really fucking worn out with so much right now, for one...myself...id like to be more "social" but if i try it turns stupid...ill stay more quiet...

ive been sick far too long

i need something new...or something inspirational, truely inspirational so i can get back to normal although if i got anything new it would be anything but normal...fuck it...

im going to go on living my life now...who knows what will happen...
---------------------matt

so the new unearth is amazing...they never fail to amaze me

things have been...things....summer school....killed ipc like fucking heinously...now im in algebra 2...fuck...last time ill ever take math though...fuck yes

i need a job...and a non stressful one...id like to work where i can sell items other than food


ebay is amazing...


-------------------matt
I made a Quiz for you! Take my Quiz! and then Check out the Scoreboard!

the mic rulah,

number one in the hood, G

this will be a post of random facts and short rants...

fuck john deere, whoever decided to put that logo on a fucking hat needs to be shot

fuck kids who THINK they are the shit, talk shit, and expect to NOT get hit....

the singer from coheed and cambria is secretly a girl, noone can look that hard and sing that high with a pair of testicles...sorry ladies

verizon wireless ampitheater blows

fuck primetime tv

last time i checked, fashion was/is pointless

who the fuck keeps jacking with the gas prices...

its needs to stop fucking raining already...or it just needs to rain a fuckload to the point that they cancel summerschool for a week...

the internet is the most dangerous place on earth...next to the middle of the ocean...or the sahara

im so sick of hearing about you(noone in particular) fucking someone how many ever times...while im doing my work in class...i dont want to hear it

i hate the lack of dedication...

ive come to find out, that reagan high school is rigged for the extra smart and rich kids...fuck everyone else right?

if the eraser fell off your pencil, youre fucked...dont bother me

something that annoys me about the so called rock star attitude: going on at an earlier time would piss of a person with this attitude going...such as 7:15....eventhough in our genre 7:15 is fucking late

i really dont like it when people fake sing to songs...thats really annoying...
i really dont like it when people ruin the mood of everything...

i think slayer should play at the white rabbit...so it will explode

people need to understand unearth is not a new band

the only reason anyone should go to ozzfest this year is to see, unearth, bleeding through, every time i die, hatebreed, judas priest, throwdown, and darkest hour...the rest of the bands sound the same

i am getting a sonor drumset soon

alrite i think im done for now...

-----------------matt
that show shorties watchin shorties is hilarious.

...im really fucking bored...if i wasnt...you wouldnt know shit about whats going on with me....

and...you still dont...and wont


youve done this to yourself
--------------------matt

so my summer is almost over...thats right once again im going to fucking summer school, thanks to youre wonderful texas school system

i was invited to go play basketball tonite, but i cant "because its too late"...im 17 fucking years old...my brother who is 13 stays out later than i do and he gets less shit for it...

oh how i love the promises my parents make right before summer starts but it takes almost nothing to make them forget it.....or go break it...im fucking sick of everything in this household, sure im lucky to be under a roof and eat when im hungry...but i think when someone tells someone something and intends for them to get excited about what someone said to them, you should go through and stay true to what you said to them...dont push it back in their face and take everything back just because one little thing that will never matter happened....

im wasting the best and worst years of my life in my fucking room in front of my fucking computer, and why...because im not allowed out to do anything at night...why, no reason at all

i agree this is a stupid post...but im fucking bored as hell...sitting in this boring fucking room waiting for nothing to happen per usual...excitement can be right around the corner...or could be thrown away....seems more times that not, its getting thrown away...

dont make us break this shit down for nothin "insert breakdown here"
---------------------------matt

FUCK www.125mb.com

FUCK www.angelfire.com

FUCK any hosting website that fucks with its clients, they can all eat my fucking dick

so things are going pretty good i guess...nothing has really sucked, cept for the fact that my teachers havent uploaded my grades to the councelor yet so i dont know if i passed or failed yet...fucking assholes

strength to rise is sounding pretty good, eventhough im worried about it because we have a hi-hat count before everything cuz someone cant make distinct drumrolls or fills

get a life sounds really good, everything is really tight and together, people like us who are dedicated to our music, with talent, can make good music quickly and make it sound good...and its a plus when noone is stubborn and is open minded to everything...its awesome

ive been kinda sick for the past 3 weeks...but its not really that bad cept for this terrible cough that wont go away...fucking sinuses or whatever i have

if anyone knows the headcase guestbook and reads it alot, someone posed as me trying to be all mean and shit, telling this person they are fucked up for saying that they heard justin was out of the band....first of all hes not out of the band....second of all i hate rumors that go around based on what idiots think they hear, third...people dont quite understand that i manage the guestbook and i could know exactly who they are by their ip address, and the person who posted posing as me must have either forgotten or didnt know how to block their ip address....so when i do some research on the post ill find out who it is...i hate when shit like that happends...

alrite well get a life has a show today, should be awesome

you walk around like your running this place, but theres a hundred kids who want to smash your fuckin, face, but ill be the first to grab you by the hair break your teeth and throw you, down the stairs
------------------------------matt

in a small space, people are scared crapless of
you!

bastard.

I am Frylock from Aqua Teen Hunger Force!!
Which Aqua Teen Hunger Force character are you?? hell yeah...this show rules!!!

so yeah...i dont have much to say...

ive been listening to alot of more relaxing mood music lately...along with my usual stuff...but yeah...i donno why...it helps me think about things i dont want to think about i guess....

ive been thinking about myself to myself too much lately...i want to be completely happy with everything, but i cant seem to really come to the thought of how that would be....sure it would be great, im not saying everything i would agree with and all that selfish shit...i would just like some things that ive been wanting, that ive been wishing to have for i dont know how long....i dont know...i know exactly what i want...i just cant explain it, it just has to be...im not very good at putting my thoughts into words...maybe because (and this will sound weird) but i think in picture, and i act out things in my mind as if i were acutally watching it happen....i cant make it be exactly how it will happen in my mind...noone can do that shit...but i try to visualize everything i think about while thinking about it...just cuz im bad at explaining details...yeah im weird...

anyway...school is sucking hard...i have to re-do my history project i did last nite...cuz i didnt have any sources...FUCK!....and i have to score really high on my next math test...and i really suck at math...i fucking hate school and its pointless bullshit that is not worth knowing anyway....FUCK high school...

yeah its over you can bet in mid october ill still be ranting about most early may
--------------------matt

i actually did some homework...for the FIRST time in the past 3 school years....i do my homework dont get me wrong...BUT i dont do it at home...i did it at home this time...do i feel achieved.......
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
NO....


oh and for the day for you to mark on your calendar

we're playing with at all cost supposedly, at the revolution/communion...ill have a flier up soon probably...

well...as you can probably tell....i changed my icon...i was sick of the picture of me being really sick in justins dads warehouse with a logo of a band name that doesnt even belong to my band anymore thanks to some guys in pennsylvania....

ANYWAY....

this weekend was....kool i guess...

friday...practiced with javi rosendo lincoln and evan, that band is sounding really good...and when i say really good...i mean...reallly good...

saturday...sat around till about 4 or so...went to robs house, made a flier, watched some movie about horror movie characters, and unloaded my equipment for practice this week...then we went to kinkos and made copies of the flier, afterwards...we got some ice cream...the whole nite while i was driving i would randomly scream "IM LAAAAATE" and drive real fast...as if i was late for prom...we kept seeing people driving real fast and limos going downtown...so yeah...it was funny...we then went and stapled the fliers to some wood in an obvious place...afterwards we went to whataburger...ate...and left...that was the just of my day...

today....was mothers day....gave my mom a park bench for the backyard......it looks kool....i designed the cover for the upcoming demo...and i must say....it looks pretty good...and HILARIOUS...this morning i got a badass recording of drums for a song that another band did from the studio we're recording at...and fucking hell yea it sounds AWESOME....im really excited...i also mowed the lawn today...that was...shitty....anyway...i had dinner with the family...it was good...now im trying to get started on my history project....ugh...its gonna suck...oh well...i gotta pass....

im looking forward to practicing alot this week...we need it...

to some people, money is like foreign films, without subtitles
--------------------matt

...shits been shit...busy....frustrating....confusing....

today was bullshit...yesterday was pointless as fuck.....tomorrow will be worse....AW SHIT...badass texas hardcore right there, tomorrow will be worse is fucking awesome...

if i had 20 dollars, and you gave me 40 dollars, and i spent 20 dollars, but you spent 60 dollars, then i spend another 20, but then some kid ran by and said 20 dollars, but he was 5 so he doesnt matter, so then i spend 20 dollars and forgot how much money i had left...can you help me?....*keep in mind that i just made up that story, and it did not really happen...if i ever have 20 dollars, and someone gives me 40 dollars, remind me to save it and not spend it*....

being missed is not felt, but missing someone and not being able to reach them is a total 180 degree feeling.......

it seems as if im always waiting....for what....who knows...ive been trying to live a little....but theres nothing to do...

....so i kinda fixed my amp...its still broken...but sorta fixed...

show tomorrow...yeah...great

fuck your fasion
------------matt

Complete This Sentence
i am not: who you think i am or who you want me to be
i hurt: when it matters...seeing noone infront of me on the floor is NOT cool
i love: the feeling of playing a good show, throwing my guitar around my shoulder, looking out and seeing people dancing to my songs, being who i am, friends...and even distant and hard to reach peoples presence....
i hate: drama, and people who like to start it. i also hate no crowd movement AND when someone clearly fucks up
i fear: losing my true self
i hope: to make it in the hxc scene and make an impact and get outta here
i hear: the same old shit over and over and over and over...
i crave: a serious relationship with someone who is down for it just as much as i am
i regret: not much....probably my education as of late...but i believe im above the useless knowledge they try to feed me...
i cry: i havent cried for many many many years
i care: about all my friends, my family, and anyone who deserves it
i always: thankful for everything i have, and truthful
i long to: see barbie again (dont go thinking obsession either)
i feel alone: when im driving by myself, when im thinking to myself, when im bymyself
i listen: to everything but words dont mean shit without actions
i hide: my true feelings alot
i drive: any fucking place i feel like...its my gas...ill use it to my liking
i sing: when i have to, have to is not when someone asks "your in a band sing me a song"...that has to be the most stupid and ignorant question/statement ive ever heard from someone who claims they are into music
i dance: at hardcore shows
i write: all the time, any spark of inspiration i have is always documented
i breathe: out of my lungs
i play: guitar, drums, diaphragm
i miss: i dont have to answer this..., and some of my old friends
i search: for the best sound every day
i learn: more in my mind than from a teacher
i feel: annoyed by shady people who cant plan for shit...several people know what im talking about, everyone else is probably thinking...what?
i know: next time i turn my car on no hope in texas will be playing
i say: /speak the the truth
i succeed: when dedicated
i fail: when i feel that it isnt important or in my best interest
i dream: of things i wish i had
i sleep: when i can...fuck you mrs degrove
i wonder: if this whole thing we call life is really real or just some grand scheme to make you think you are important
i want: to play more shows around town, make the fanbase grow, record again
i worry: about more than i should
i have: my band, equipment, friends, car, computer, brain
i give: my all towards what is important to me
i fight: if it comes down to it
i wait: too long for things to happen...although i call that 'patients'
i need: to get out of school already
i am: myself and noone else
i think: that people who dont know what they are talking about need to shut the fuck up
i can't help the fact that: i am the way i am, if i wasnt it wouldnt be me
i stay: true till death
------------------------matt

i cant get her off my mind...so heres the whole story behind it

i remember all of this like it was yesterday...so if youre wondering that...yes i remember very well last march....around this time i was still in guitar lessons(still am for theory and reading) and i happened to go into century music with my guitar and i sat down and just played it waiting for my lesson...well this gorgeous girl walks in...with her friend who was there to take bass lessons...and when i say gorgeous i mean seriously gorgeous....she was looking at a fender guitar with silver glitter sparkles stuff on it...it wasnt a bad guitar....but anyway...she sat down on some amps looking around the store...this time ill take to describe her....short brown kinda punkish hair, black hoodie with a casualties patch on the back jeans chucks, brown eyes, beautiful face, nice smile...anyway...this other guy comes in and by this time i had plugged into an amp and i was playing a converge song i believe...and she asked me if i was in a band and i said yea 2 actually one is punk and one is hardcore metal...she replied thats kool im kinda in a band but the other members arent as dedicated as me...and i said yea i know how that is...then the other guy kinda interrupted and was like...dude check it out i learned that drowning pool song...and he played it...me and her both watched...we were kinda far apart from each other...we both looked at each other and looked away and whatnot...she smiled i smiled...it was a kool moment.....anyway she asked if i liked street punk and i said yea its pretty kool and i said you like the casualties right? and she said yea they are awesome so i played 30 seconds or so of their song nightmare she was like...oh man thats so awesome i wish i could play that...i said...well i can teach it to you....are you going to be in here on wednesdays?...she said yea im probably going to be coming with my friend to her bass lessons...and then my teacher was like...hey matt ready...so i had to leave....i was walking to the room and i turned around and asked....whats your name?....barbie....yours?...matt...nice meeting you....i noticed she was smiling alot....anyway...the next week i went in and she was there and before anything i asked for her screen name....converseandstuds but ill probably change it tonite to faithinchaos....ive only talked to her twice online...she never changed her sn....anyway....i tried teaching her nightmare and she was like...umm...i dont know chords very well...come behind me and show me...so i got up and assisted her...she kinda learned the song a little better but still didnt understand it very well...although she was doing good for the first time playing it....i had to take my lessons early that day...so i said ill talk to her later....she smiled....the next week it was about mid april...she was there with a few friends and i sat down and she came over and was like hey whats up....i said nothing really hows it going?...good, nice to see you.....i said...nice to see you too with a smile....i had to take my lessons early again so i said well i have to go...sorry i couldnt teach you much more...she said it was kool and waived bye....the next week...i went in but my teacher wasnt there so we just talked didnt even think about learning nightmare...she said she had put the silver guitar on layaway and was getting it soon....but it was kinda held back because she had broken her thumb in a youth brigade pit...we talked about shows we had been to...and before i knew it she had to leave....we said bye and she left...i looked at amps the rest of the time i was there....the next week...it was mid may nearing the end of school...i was walking to the door and she was walking out i was carrying my jackson with me and i told her id show it to her when i had it...she loved it...but she had to leave...so we said bye...i went in and looked at amps and got my guitar re-strung...the next week it was the end of may and school was over in a few days....she was also leaving somewhere so we just said hey and bye realy quick...and yea...i went and took my lessons........and that was the last time i saw her......i never stopped thinking about her during the whole summer...i know there was a few girls who liked me over the summer....but i realllly like/liked barbie and i missed her more than you could imagine......but i never got to see her...and i kept telling myself...next time i see her...im going to ask her out...im going to do it....the next time i saw her was the friday before labor day weekend at red reverse's first show back...i didnt talk to her at all....i was paralyzed by the shock of seeing her there....and she walked right past me....i dont know what i was thinking....i havent seen her since....i still miss her alot...and id like to see her again....but i doubt it will happen....i can hope for it though....until the day i see her again...i will miss her....

id pick her over anyone though....sorry anyone who that offends or gets to in a bad way...but i would....
-------------------matt

this past week went by kinda fast i think....

monday...practice with out javi...3 new songs within an hour and a half!!!

tuesday...practice with javi...awesome...we got down everything...

wednesday...practice again...awesome making adjustments and making stuff better...

thursday...final practice before the show...played the set...everything down...

friday...show...it was awesome...we seriously tore the place down....it started out with my smacking the fuck out of my backup mic....it fell like a ton of bricks...there were 51 people there for us....sam was being held up by the crowd alot...it was awesome....it was a kool feeling playing again even though i dont remember the show too well since it went by so fast....it was a crazy show...some things seemed like they were missing ....i dont know what it was though....people came upto us afterwards and said that we need to play at better places and have more dancing...it was kool getting that feedback from people....everyone liked the new songs alot...which is fucking awesome...

spring break is this week...im getting insurance tomorrow and ill be driving!! FUCKING FINALLY!!

over spring break id like to find a new band name...i think we're going to remain as headcase until the uriel cd release party at the white rabbit in june....BUT...when we play other places we will be known as the new name...just because it would be less confusing that way...

we have the strength to rise...
----------------------------matt
